languages.text: {n}Абеляр потирает бородку.{/n} "Возможно, это во мне старый офицер {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Флота{/g} говорит, но я почти уверен, что это была не змея, класс корабля. Фрегат типа "Кобра".

traits.locale_text: {n}Абеляр потирает бородку.{/n} "Возможно, это во мне старый офицер флота говорит, но я почти уверен, что это была не змея, а кобра. Фрегат типа "Кобра". Класс корабля".

languages.text: {n}Abelard strokes his beard.{/n} "Perhaps this is the old {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Navy{/g} officer in me talking, but I am almost certain he wasn't talking about a snake, but a Cobra-class destroyer. 'Cobra' going to 'class,' you see?"
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр потирает бородку.{/n} "Возможно, это во мне старый офицер {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Флота{/g} говорит, но я почти уверен, что это была не змея, класс корабля. Фрегат типа "Кобра".

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard strokes his beard.{/n} "Perhaps this is the old {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Navy{/g} officer in me talking, but I am almost certain he wasn't talking about a snake, but a cobra. A Cobra-class frigate. 'Snakes' going to 'class,' you see?"
{n}Abelard rubs his beard.{/n} "Considering Grandpa Denz's occupation, I'm almost certain it was not just a snake, but a cobra. A Cobra-class frigate. And the 'class' being the class of a ship."

{n}Abelard strokes his beard.{/n} "Perhaps this is the old {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Navy{/g} officer in me talking, but I am almost certain he wasn't talking about a snake, but a cobra. A Cobra-class frigate. 'Snakes' going to 'class,' you see?"
{n}Abelard rubs his beard.{/n} "Considering your Grandpa Denz's former occupation, I'll bet he wasn't talking about a snake, but a cobra. A Cobra-class frigate. 'Snakes' going to 'class,' you see?"
{n}Abelard rubs his beard.{/n} "Considering your Grandpa Denz's former occupation, I'll bet he wasn't talking about a snake, but a cobra. A Cobra-class frigate. 'Snakes' going to 'class,' you see?"

{n}Abelard strokes his beard.{/n} "Perhaps this is the old {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Navy{/g} officer in me talking, but I am almost certain he wasn't talking about a snake, but a cobra. A Cobra-class frigate. 'Snakes' going to 'class,' you see?"

{n}Abelard strokes his beard.{/n} "Perhaps this is the old {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Navy{/g} officer in me talking, but I am almost certain he wasn't talking about a snake, but a Cobra-class destroyer. 'Cobra' going to 'class,' you see?"

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德捋着胡子。{/n}“可能是我这个老{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}海军{/g}军官的职业病，但我几乎可以肯定，他说的并不是什么蛇和鸡，而是一艘眼镜蛇级驱逐舰。‘眼镜蛇’和‘级’，说得通吧？”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard strokes his beard.{/n} "Perhaps this is the old {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Navy{/g} officer in me talking, but I am almost certain he wasn't talking about a snake, but a Cobra-class destroyer. 'Cobra' going to 'class,' you see?"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德捋着胡子。{/n}“可能是我这个老{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}海军{/g}军官的职业病，但我几乎可以肯定，他说的并不是什么蛇和鸡，而是一艘眼镜蛇级护卫舰。‘眼镜蛇’和‘级’，说得通吧？”

languages.text: {n}Abelard se mesa la barba.{/n} «Tal vez solo sea por mi experiencia en la {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Armada{/g}, pero estoy convencido de que no hablaba de serpientes, sino de un destructor de clase Cobra. ¿Ve el parecido?».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard strokes his beard.{/n} "Perhaps this is the old {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Navy{/g} officer in me talking, but I am almost certain he wasn't talking about a snake, but a Cobra-class destroyer. 'Cobra' going to 'class,' you see?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard se mesa la barba.{/n} «Tal vez solo sea por mi experiencia en la {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Armada{/g}, pero estoy convencido de que no hablaba de serpientes, sino de una fragata clase Cobra. ¿Ve el parecido?».

languages.text: {n}アベラルドがひげを撫でる。{/n}「我の{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}海軍{/g}士官としての直感が言っていますが、恐らく彼は蛇ではなく、コブラクラスのデストロイヤー艦のことを話していたんだと思います。『コブラ』が『クラス』に出るとは、そういう意味かと」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard strokes his beard.{/n} "Perhaps this is the old {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Navy{/g} officer in me talking, but I am almost certain he wasn't talking about a snake, but a Cobra-class destroyer. 'Cobra' going to 'class,' you see?"

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドがひげを撫でる。{/n}「我の{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}海軍{/g}士官としての直感が言っていますが、恐らく彼は蛇ではなく、コブラクラスのデストロイヤー艦のことを話していたんだと思います。『コブラ』が『クラス』に出るとは、そういう意味かと」

languages.text: {n}Abelard streicht sich durch den Bart.{/n} "Vielleicht ist das nur der alte {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Flottenoffizier{/g} in mir, aber ich bin fast sicher, dass er nicht von einer Schlange sprach, sondern von einem Zerstörer der Kobra-Klasse. 'Kobra' in die 'Klasse', verstehst du?"
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard strokes his beard.{/n} "Perhaps this is the old {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Navy{/g} officer in me talking, but I am almost certain he wasn't talking about a snake, but a Cobra-class destroyer. 'Cobra' going to 'class,' you see?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard streicht sich durch den Bart.{/n} "Vielleicht ist das nur der alte {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Flottenoffizier{/g} in mir, aber ich bin fast sicher, dass er nicht von einer Schlange sprach, sondern von einer Fregatte der Kobra-Klasse. 'Kobra' in die 'Klasse', verstehst du?"

languages.text: {n}Abélard se frotte la barbe.{/n} « C'est peut-être l'ancien officier de la {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}marine{/g} en moi qui parle, mais je suis persuadé qu'il parlait d'un destroyer de classe Cobra et non pas d'un serpent. C'est de là que viennent les mots "cobra" et "classe", tu comprends ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard strokes his beard.{/n} "Perhaps this is the old {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Navy{/g} officer in me talking, but I am almost certain he wasn't talking about a snake, but a Cobra-class destroyer. 'Cobra' going to 'class,' you see?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard se frotte la barbe.{/n} « C'est peut-être l'ancien officier de la {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}marine{/g} en moi qui parle, mais je suis persuadé qu'il parlait d'une frégate de classe Cobra et non pas d'un serpent. C'est de là que viennent les mots "cobra" et "classe", tu comprends ? »

languages.text: {n}Abelard sakalını sıvazlıyor.{/n} "Belki içimdeki eski {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Donanma{/g} subayı konuşuyordur ama bir yılandan değil de Kobra sınıfı bir muhripten bahsettiğinden neredeyse adım kadar eminim. 'Kobra' ve 'sınıf'ı art arda kullanmış işte."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard strokes his beard.{/n} "Perhaps this is the old {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Navy{/g} officer in me talking, but I am almost certain he wasn't talking about a snake, but a Cobra-class destroyer. 'Cobra' going to 'class,' you see?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard sakallarını okşuyor.{/n} "Belki eski {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Donanma{/g} subaylığı yaptığım günlerden kalma bir alışkanlıktır ama bir yılandan değil, Kobra sınıfı bir muhripten bahsettiğine neredeyse adım kadar eminim. 'Kobra' ve 'sınıf', anladın mı?"
